package.name: ndlcom
package.description:
Node Data Link Communication ----------------------------
Done for iStruct and SeeGrip, 2010-2013.
functions to encode/decode simple serial communication layer2 message format called "ndlcom" for "Node Data Link Communication"
See also README.md
package.author: Armin Burchardt
